title: Flat File All Orders Data Reports
description: Flat File All Orders Data by Order Date General Reports

amazon-order-id.description: Unique identifier for the order on Amazon platform

merchant-order-id.description: Identifier for the order set by the merchant

purchase-date.description: Timestamp of the order purchase date

last-updated-date.description: Timestamp of the last update for the order

order-status.description: Status of the order (e.g., Pending, Shipped)

fulfillment-channel.description: Channel through which the order is fulfilled (e.g., FBA, Seller Fulfilled)

sales-channel.description: Channel through which the sale was made

order-channel.description: Channel through which the order was placed

ship-service-level.description: Service level of shipping (e.g., Standard, Expedited)

product-name.description: Name of the product in the order

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit for the product in the order

asin.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number for the product

item-status.description: Status of the item in the order

item-price.description: Price of each item in the order

item-tax.description: Tax charged on the item price

shipping-price.description: Price of shipping for the order

shipping-tax.description: Tax applied on the shipping price

gift-wrap-price.description: Price of gift wrapping for the order

gift-wrap-tax.description: Tax applied on the gift wrapping price

item-promotion-discount.description: Discount applied on the item price due to promotion

ship-promotion-discount.description: Discount applied to the shipping cost due to promotions

ship-city.description: City to which the order is being shipped

ship-state.description: State to which the order is being shipped

ship-postal-code.description: Postal code of the shipping address

ship-country.description: Country to which the order is being shipped

promotion-ids.description: Identifiers for promotions applied to the order

cpf.description: Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas - Brazilian individual taxpayer registry identification number

is-business-order.description: Indicator if the order is a business order

purchase-order-number.description: Number associated with the order for purchase tracking

price-designation.description: Price designation for the order (e.g., Regular price, Discounted price)

signature-confirmation-recommended.description: Indicator if signature confirmation is recommended for the order
